sentences.en: Activated carbon - supported catalysts are excellent catalysts for denitrification of flue gas temperature.
sentences.cn: 活性炭基催化剂是低温烟气脱氮的优良催化剂.

sentences.en: Flue gas desulfurization is the common method to control sulfur dioxide discharge.
sentences.cn: 烟气脱硫是控制二氧化硫排放的最常用方法.

sentences.en: If the flue overdraws, all the heat goes right up the chimney.
sentences.cn: 如果风管抽风过度的话, 热量就会从烟囱直接跑掉了.

sentences.en: Responsible for flue gas DeNOx process design, checking, consulting and so on.
sentences.cn: 负责烟气脱硝工程的工艺设计, 校核, 咨询等工作.

sentences.en: Schools could also be used as places to give flue vasitinationsflu vaccinations.
sentences.cn: 学校也是用于接种流感疫苗的地方.

sentences.en: Semi - dry flue gas desulfurization is often used in industry.
sentences.cn: 半干法烟气脱硫是广泛采用的烟气脱硫工艺之一.

sentences.en: So them flew through a flaw in the flue.
sentences.cn: 就那样,它们就飞越了烟道里的一条裂纹.

sentences.en: Steam generation from this hot flue gas is a last resort option.
sentences.cn: 从这种高温烟道气生产蒸汽是一种最后的选择.

sentences.en: Tea and flue - cured tobacco is an important cash crop.
sentences.cn: 茶叶和 烤烟 是重要的经济作物.

sentences.en: The fire won't burn because the flue is blocked up.
sentences.cn: 因烟道堵塞火烧不起来.

sentences.en: The flue has become sooted up.
The flue should draw better once it's been swept.
sentences.cn: 烟道一经清扫,通风情况应好些.

sentences.en: The flue temperature increases greatly in the furnace refractory faced zone.
sentences.cn: 炉膛内敷设卫燃带显著提高烟气的温度.

sentences.en: The resulting flue gas is almost pure carbon dioxide.
sentences.cn: 产生的管道气体几乎仅仅是二氧化碳.

sentences.en: Vent all waste hydrogen through a flue or flare stack.
sentences.cn: 通过烟道或火把烟筒排出所有废氢.

words.tran_cn: [建]烟道；暖气管；蓬松的东西；钩爪；渔网（等于flew）

phrases.tran_cn: n. 烟灰；烟道灰；炉顶灰

trans.tran_en: a metal pipe or tube that lets smoke or heat from a fire out of a building
